summary: Quick holiday mod featuring an animated Snowman follower.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][i][b][size=5]Happy Holidays!
[/size][/b][/i][/color][url=http://www.confrerie-des-traducteurs.fr/skyrim/mods/personnages/compagnons/m._bonhomme_de_neige]
French Version (offsite)[/url]

This is a quick, holiday, follower mod featuring [color=#00ffff]Frosty the Snowman[/color]. The head is mostly animated, the eyes blink, the mouth moves when he talks, etc. His primary body texture is the snow texture you're using in your game. Results may vary based on what texture replacers your have installed for snow, carrots, and the branches. He's using the vanilla MaleDarkElf voice.

He can be found wandering around [color=#00ff00]Winterhold[/color].

[center][img]http://www.clipartkid.com/images/478/go-back-gallery-for-frosty-the-snowman-clipart-aKgCIT-clipart.jpg[/img][/center]
[center][youtube]TXyVP0LVRLo[/youtube][/center]
ViciousSarr created basically all of the assets aside from what was used from the vanilla game and she weight-painted all of it. I just created the .TRI files and set everything up.
author: Levionte and ViciousSarr
